paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on BRCA2 variants, including penetrance data and individual case details.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: PT1 (a 50‐year‐old woman) was referred for genetic counseling after a diagnosis of bilateral IDC and was found to be HR+ and HER2/neu‐.

functional_data.summary: Functional analysis of the intronic variant identified a deletion within exon 12 in the BRIP1 gene, which caused abnormal transcriptional production.

variants.additional_notes: The patient had a family history of cancer.
key_quotes: The proband's father died from lung cancer at 61 years old, and her sister was also diagnosed with bilateral breast cancer.

extraction_metadata.notes: Extracted data focused solely on BRCA2 variants as per instructions.
